title: Beetroot Juice
summary: Beetroot Juice is a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 recipe with 1 servings. One portion of this dish contains approximately 6g of protein, 1g of fat, and a total of 261 calories. For $1.82 per serving, this recipe covers 20% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have beetroots, a piece of ginger, oranges, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It works well as an affordable beverage. 25 people have made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 95%. This score is outstanding.
